name: Snow&Beaver
description:
SNOW&BEAVER

Snow&Beaver is a game where a beaver steals your chocolate and you have to catch him!

HOW TO PLAY

  • [Space] To jump
  • [E] To attack in air
  • Press [Q] until the bar is full to do a trick and gain speed

                          

You can press [Space] to jump on the log, you can also press [Space] again to get off the log.

You can press [E] to attack stars and get knockback!

You can do tha same on log!

If you keep pressing [Q] you can do a trick ang gain speed!
